review: Our journey with the Doctor from pregnancy confirmation to post delivery is very satisfactory.Her patience in listening to patients adds value to her vast experience as Gynec. Overall experience with the Doctor is positive. I would strongly recommend the Doctor for pregnancy consultations.

I recommend  Dr. Susmitha Reddy

We have recently visited her clinic located at Nizampet for pregnancy related checkup . My wife has little bit nervous and many questions about her health and pregnancy, but doctor listens all of them patiently and helped in boost her confidence level. She is so nice and down to earth kind of attitude make us more comfortable.

Her suggestions and experience really working well for my wife. I really appreciate your help Dr. Susmitha Reddy.

Moreover she responds to our call in case of any urgent matters and make her self highly available whenever required.

One suggestion to all from my side please don't go by brand like Rainbow, Fernandez etc instead go by doctor and her experience.

Hope all works well with you. Have a great day.

Best Regards,
Ravikanth Manik.

I consulted doctor for my wife, we had a great experience. She understood the problem patiently and then suggested the best approach. Mostly I have seen many doctor‚Äôs recommendations around surgery but Dr Sushmita prefers medicine treatment than surgery..I will recommend the doctor to my friends and family.
